name: QONQR: World Domination Command Center - Game Expansion
blurb: Help us transform Location-Based Gaming by creating a new map-driven iPad and Web Interface for our MMO strategy game, QONQR.

rewards.reward: 10 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), Backer Designation on our community forums where you can share ideas with other backers and Team QONQR, an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - PRIVATE), recognition in the Kickstarter Backers section of the Game Credits, plus our sincere thanks!

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 25 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - LANCE CORPORAL), plus access to our Ultra-Classified Video Blog which gives you a behind-the-scenes look at what goes on at an independent game studio, and a set of Kickstarter Exclusive Desktop Wallpapers!

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, plus a BLACK "Q" T-SHIRT as worn by Team QONQR in our Kickstarter Video. (This is only the plain black QONQR T-Shirt. The $100 Reward Level will include this shirt, plus your choice of any of a number of high-quality American Apparel shirts of varying colors and designs including Faction specific options.) See Project Update #1 for more details.  (International backers, please add $10 for shipping.)

POWER CUBES LEVEL! You don't care about all that other stuff, you just want MORE CUBES! This reward level for the Hardcore QONQR player gets you a total of 125 Power Cubes. This reward is not included in any of the higher reward levels.

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 50 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - SERGEANT), plus an awesome set of QONQR Stickers for your laptop or wherever else you want to flash your Faction Pride!

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 75 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - GUNNERY SERGEANT), plus a set of Stainless Steel QONQR Dogtags embossed with your Faction and Codename! (International backers, please add $5 for shipping.)

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 100 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - MASTER SERGEANT), plus make your friends jealous with the stylish QONQR T-shirt of your choice! (International backers, please add $10 for shipping.)

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 150 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - SERGEANT MAJOR), plus you can create a BATTLE FIELD in the game! You choose the name and location (subject to review by us).

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 250 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - WARRANT OFFICER), plus you can rock your local fashion scene with a sweet QONQR Hoodie, AND we'll send you an 8x10" Autographed Personalized Photo of Team QONQR posing with a picture of you or your in-game character!

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 500 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - FIRST LIEUTENANT), plus YOU GET TO DESIGN A WEAPON IN THE GAME! We'll work with  you to define the name, specs, and look of a new weapon (final version subject to review by us).

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 1000 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - CAPTAIN), plus you can be a BETA TESTER for the new iPad interface! You'll have access to early builds months before anyone else and your feedback will influence the direction of QONQR Development!

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 2500 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - MAJOR), plus our amazing illustrator will create a CUSTOM PORTRAIT of you (or your character, or someone you choose) beside your Faction Leader! The illustration will be provided as a High-Res digital image, and a high quality 36" x 24" poster print.

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 5000 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - GENERAL), plus YOU BECOME A CHARACTER IN THE QONQR STORYLINE! That's right, your character will appear in web comics, novellas, illustrations, videos, etc. as an integral part of the evolving transmedia storyline of QONQR. YOU'LL BE FAMOUS!

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, a total of 10,000 Power Cubes (our premium in-game currency), an exclusive In-Game Medal (BACKER - LEGENDARY HERO), plus Scott or Justin will fly to your location and hang out with you or speak at your function about gaming or startups. OR, we'll fly you to Minneapolis for an exclusive party at QONQR Headquarters! (All flights limited to the contiguous United States).
